thread.title: Patrice Evra celebrates return to Marseille training with hilarious singing video… but warns fans ‘don’t punch your girlfriend in the throat’ if she gets excited too

author: smorgan
title: Patrice Evra celebrates return to Marseille training with hilarious singing video… but warns fans ‘don’t punch your girlfriend in the throat’ if she gets excited too
text:
EFL 'Just excitement' Patrice Evra celebrates return to Marseille training with hilarious singing video… but warns fans ‘don’t punch your girlfriend in the throat’ if she gets excited too 
Former Manchester United and Juventus full-back's Instagram account got weird in clip posted from car Video 13th March 2017, 2:48 pm Updated: 13th March 2017, 6:23 pm
